roleset.name: cause to not have parents
roleset.note: ORPHAN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'orphan' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 29.7. (from orphan.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: a disney moment
example.text: But then, even a great many words couldn't summarize the extraordinary pull of this movie about an orphaned bear who adopts a parent.
